thread.title: Raja Balu

author: Raja Balu
title: Raja Balu
text: this is first time I booked ticket through flydealfare. I was having so many questions when I opened this page. Neha, the booking agent who helped me a lot with all answers. They way they explain stuff really will take them to places... Appreciate.... I was having hesitation while booking since I had to pay on their site. But it was smooth and got wonderful deal.
